media.headline: Dozier's athletic play
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Dozier nabs Mondesi with nifty glove flip
media.bigblurb: Brian Dozier charges hard to stop Raul Mondesi's bunt and makes a heads-up play by flipping it to first in time to get the out in the 3rd

media.headline: Buxton's outstanding catch
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Buxton lays out to make marvelous catch
media.bigblurb: Byron Buxton reads a line drive perfectly and lays out to make an impressive diving grab to take a hit away from Alex Gordon in the 3rd

media.headline: Moustakas opens the scoring
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Moustakas jacks a solo homer to right
media.bigblurb: Mike Moustakas puts the Royals on the board for the first time in 2017 as he crushes a solo home run to right in the top of the 4th

media.headline: Sano's solo blast
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Sano launches a moonshot to left
media.bigblurb: Miguel Sano evens the score in the bottom of the 4th as he launches a solo home run into the second level in left on Opening Day

media.headline: Royals starters introduced
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Yost, Royals starters introduced
media.bigblurb: Manager Ned Yost and the Royals' starting lineup are introduced prior to facing the Twins in Opening Day

media.headline: Twins' starters introduced
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Twins' lineup introduced on Opening Day
media.bigblurb: The Twins announce their starting lineup in front of the crowd at Target Field before starting the 2017 season

media.headline: Santana opens 2017 season
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Santana tosses first pitch of 2017 season
media.bigblurb: Ervin Santana faces Alex Gordon and throws the first pitch of the 2017 season for the Twins at Target Field

media.headline: Buxton's second remarkable catch
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Buxton robs Orlando with another great grab
media.bigblurb: Byron Buxton charges in and dives to make his second spectacular catch of the game, snagging Paulo Orlando's fly ball in the 5th

media.headline: Polanco scores on walk
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Grossman draws walk to bring in Polanco
media.bigblurb: Robbie Grossman draws a walk with the bases loaded and Jorge Polanco comes in to score, giving the Twins a 2-1 lead in the 7th

media.headline: Kepler reaches first
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Kepler safe at first on overturned call
media.bigblurb: Max Kepler reaches first base safely after the Twins use a challenge in the bottom of the 7th inning

media.headline: Stelmaszek throws first pitch
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Former coach Stelmaszek tosses first pitch
media.bigblurb: Former Twins bullpen coach Rick Stelmaszek throws out the ceremonial first pitch on Opening Day at Target Field

media.headline: Castro's two-run single
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Castro brings in two with a single to left
media.bigblurb: Jason Castro extends the Twins' lead to 6-1 as he lifts a single into left field to bring home Robbie Grossman and Joe Mauer in the 7th

media.headline: Polanco's RBI single
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Polanco's single brings home Sano
media.bigblurb: Jorge Polanco clubs a ground ball into right field and Miguel Sano comes in to score the Twins' sixth run of the 7th inning

media.headline: Gordon's running catch
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Gordon makes a nice grab on the run
media.bigblurb: Joe Mauer hits a high fly ball in foul territory and Alex Gordon hustles to make a nice grab on the run in the bottom of the 2nd

media.headline: Santana retires Hosmer
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Santana fans Hosmer for first K of 2017
media.bigblurb: Ervin Santana picks up his first of three strikeouts in seven innings of work as he gets Eric Hosmer to go down swinging in the 7th

media.headline: Kepler doubles the lead
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Kepler crosses home on bases-loaded walk
media.bigblurb: Joe Mauer draws a walk on five pitches with the bases loaded and Max Kepler trots home to double the Twins' lead in the 7th

media.headline: Sano helps Dozier score
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Sano draws bases-loaded walk to score Dozier
media.bigblurb: Miguel Sano draws the second consecutive walk on five pitches with the bases loaded and Brian Dozier comes in to score in the 7th

media.headline: Twins score six in the 7th
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Twins rally for six runs in the 7th inning
media.bigblurb: The Twins break a 1-1 tie with six runs scored in the 7th inning, including three bases-loaded walks and Jason Castro's two-run single

media.headline: Buxton's two great grabs
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Buxton makes two terrific catches vs. Royals
media.bigblurb: Byron Buxton shows off his range as he races to make a sparkling catch on Alex Gordon and then makes another grab on Paulo Orlando

media.headline: Santana on his season debut
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Santana on his strong outing on Opening Day
media.bigblurb: Ervin Santana talks about his solid debut and his team's positive mentality on Opening Day against the Royals

media.headline: Minor gets hit, stays in game
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Minor stays in game after getting hit
media.bigblurb: Mike Minor gets hit with a comebacker off the bat of Brian Dozier and manages to stay in the game after a brief delay

media.headline: Duffy retires Grossman
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Duffy fans Grossman for first K of season
media.bigblurb: Danny Duffy picks up his first strikeout of the season, and first of eight in six innings of work, as he gets Robbie Grossman swinging

media.headline: Santana's strong season debut
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Santana fans three, holds Royals to one run
media.bigblurb: Ervin Santana strikes out three over seven innings of work vs. the Royals, allowing one run on two hits and two walks in the Twins' 7-1 win

media.headline: Brass Quintet performs anthem
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Minnesota Brass Quintet performs anthem
media.bigblurb: The Minnesota Orchestra Brass Quintet performs the national anthem on Opening Day at Target Field

media.headline: Duffy strikes out eight
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Duffy strikes out eight over six innings
media.bigblurb: Danny Duffy strikes out eight over six innings, allowing just one run on three hits and three walks vs. the Twins

media.headline: Statcast: Buxton's leaping catch
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Statcast measures Buxton's catch probability
media.bigblurb: Statcast measures Byron Buxton's catch probability at 24% on his diving catch on Opening Day against the Royals

media.headline: Statcast: Buxton's two catches
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Statcast compares Buxton's diving catches
media.bigblurb: Statcast compares the catch probability of Byron Buxton's two diving catches on Opening Day against the Royals

media.headline: Recap: KC 1, MIN 7
media.blurb: 4/3/17: Strong 7th inning powers Twins to 7-1 win
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Jason Castro and Miguel Sano both drove in two runs with Sano belting a home run to back a strong outing from Ervin Santana

media.headline: 4/3/17 CG: KC@MIN
media.blurb: 4/3/17 Condensed Game: KC@MIN
media.bigblurb: 4/3/17 Condensed Game: KC@MIN

media.headline: Molitor on Opening Day mindset
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Molitor discusses Opening Day atmosphere
media.bigblurb: Twins manager Paul Molitor talks about the atmosphere of Opening Day, the team's mindset and Ervin Santana's start
